There=
 was a pause.  And then a shake of the head from WHEELIE.  "My ALLIES the M=
AXIMALS are not, for my friends they have forgot.  On this world, if I must=
 make it my home, then I will go wtih my friends or go out on my own."

WHE=
ELIE watched the erupting volcano, goign to bring out a telescopic visor to=

as going on.  The AUTOBOTS had been where his friends were, and the AUTOBOT=
S were no more.  He was not fond of the MAXIMALS for he had never been one.=
